Package org.forgerock.openidm.audit.impl

Class RouterAuditEventHandlerConfiguration

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.audit.events.handlers.EventHandlerConfiguration
org.forgerock.openidm.audit.impl.RouterAuditEventHandlerConfiguration
public class RouterAuditEventHandlerConfiguration extends org.forgerock.audit.events.handlers.EventHandlerConfiguration
A configuration for router audit event handler.

This configuration object can be created from JSON. Example of valid JSON configuration: 

  {
    "resourcePath" : "system/auditdb"
  }
